contact_page_slogan_extended: Whether you have a question, a problem, or want to inquire about subscriptions, we are here to help.
general_inquiries_desc: For any general questions about the platform or legal matters.
subscription_inquiries_desc: For details about our plans, pricing, or upgrading your subscription.
technical_issues_desc: If you encounter any technical problems while using our services.
contact_form_message: Alternatively, you can fill out our contact form here:
why_qanon_ai_a: Qanon.ai streamlines your legal work with advanced AI tools, saving you time, reducing errors, and enhancing your productivity. Gain access to intelligent document analysis, contract management, risk assessment, and case solutions. Our platform ensures data security and offers multilingual support.
what_are_ai_tools_q: What AI tools does Qanon.ai offer?
what_are_ai_tools_a: Our tools include document summarization, information extraction, legal rephrasing, contract generation, contract risk analysis, and comprehensive case analysis with suggested solutions. We are continuously expanding our suite of AI-powered features.
data_security_q: How secure is my data on Qanon.ai?
data_security_a: Data security is our top priority. We employ advanced encryption protocols and strict access controls to ensure your sensitive legal documents and information are protected and confidential at all times. Your data is never shared or used without your explicit consent.
how_to_subscribe_a: You can sign up for a free account to explore basic features. To unlock full capabilities, visit your dashboard and choose an upgrade plan that suits your needs. Our subscription plans offer various tiers of token usage and advanced features.
description_ai_assistant: Your smart legal assistant, understanding your needs and providing integrated solutions through chat.
failed_to_process_request_chat: Sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again.
privacy_policy_intro: At Qanon.ai, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. Please read this policy carefully.
info_collection_desc: We collect various types of information in connection with the services we provide, including:
personal_data: Personal Data: Information that can be used to identify you, such as your name, email address, phone number, and subscription details.
usage_data: Usage Data: Information about how you access and use our services, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on pages. This helps us improve our service.
legal_document_data: Legal Document Data: The text and content of legal documents, queries, and specific information you input into our AI tools. This data is processed to provide the requested AI service (e.g., summarization, contract drafting, risk analysis).
service_provision: To provide and maintain our services, including operating our AI tools.
service_improvement: To improve our website, services, and develop new features based on aggregated, anonymized usage patterns.
security: To ensure the security of our platform and prevent fraudulent or unauthorized access.
communication: To communicate with you regarding your account, updates, and customer support.
compliance: To comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes.
data_sharing_desc: We do not sell, rent, or trade your Personal Data. We may share information in the following limited circumstances:
ai_providers_sharing: AI Service Providers: We send the text of your queries and documents to third-party AI models (e.g., Google Gemini) solely for the purpose of processing your request and generating a response. We ensure these providers are contractually obligated not to use your data for training their models or for any other purpose.
service_providers_sharing: Third-Party Service Providers: We may use third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our services (e.g., database hosting, email sending). These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
legal_requirements_sharing: Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information where required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
data_security_section_desc: We implement robust security measures, including encryption (both in transit and at rest), access controls, and regular security audits, to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We strive to use commercially acceptable means of protecting your Personal Data, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
access_right: Right to Access: You have the right to request copies of your Personal Data.
correction_right: Right to Correction: You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or incomplete.
deletion_right: Right to Deletion: You have the right to request that we erase your Personal Data, under certain conditions.
policy_changes_desc: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
contact_us_section_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us:
agree_to_terms_required: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
